User-agent: *
Allow: /
Allow: /o-nas
Allow: /lekarze
Allow: /uslugi
Allow: /aktualnosci
Allow: /poradnik
Allow: /kontakt

# Disallow private routes
Disallow: /user/*
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /signup
Disallow: /forgot-password
Disallow: /admin/*
Disallow: /doctors/*
Disallow: /appointments
Disallow: /details
Disallow: /profile

# Disallow external protocol URLs that shouldn't be crawled
Disallow: /tel:*
Disallow: /mailto:*
Disallow: /*tel:*
Disallow: /*mailto:*

# Disallow undefined or invalid URLs
Disallow: /*/undefined
Disallow: /aktualnosci/undefined
Disallow: /poradnik/undefined
Disallow: /uslugi/undefined

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://centrummedyczne7.pl/sitemap.xml
